analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o // gang de la mthar gyis gnas @429a *// pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
translated: and does not dedicate those wholesome roots to the level of a solitary buddha.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //🔽gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o // gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
translated: “If they teach the doctrine that the nine serial absorptions are empty, that they are signless, that they are wishless, that they are calm, that they are void, that they should be abandoned, that they are absolutely to be realized, and that they are not absolutely to be realized, and if, by way of not apprehending anything, they teach the doctrine that those wholesome roots should not be dedicated to the level of a śrāvaka or the level of a pratyekabuddha, but should be dedicated to the knowledge of all aspects, then, Śāriputra, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family will have even greater merit than the previous ones.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //

translated: “If they teach the doctrine that the nine serial absorptions are empty, that they are signless, that they are wishless, that they are calm, that they are void, that they should be abandoned, that they are absolutely to be realized, and that they are not absolutely to be realized, and if, by way of not apprehending anything, they teach the doctrine that those wholesome roots should not be dedicated to the level of a śrāvaka or the level of a pratyekabuddha, but should be dedicated to the knowledge of all aspects, then, Śāriputra, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family will have even greater merit than the previous ones.🔽“If they teach the doctrine that the nine serial absorptions are empty, that they are signless, that they are wishless, that they are calm, that they are void, that they should be abandoned, that they are absolutely to be realized, and that they are not absolutely to be realized, and if, by way of not apprehending anything, they teach the doctrine that those wholesome roots should not be dedicated to the level of a śrāvaka or the level of a pratyekabuddha, but should be dedicated to the knowledge of all aspects, then, Śāriputra, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family will have even greater merit than the previous ones.

original: gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //🔽gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

translated: “They teach the doctrine that the nine serial absorptions are wishless, and they do so without apprehending anything.🔽And they do not dedicate any of their wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or to the pratyekabuddha level,🔽except for the knowledge of all aspects.🔽“They teach the doctrine that the nine serial absorptions are not composite, and they do so without apprehending anything.🔽

analyzed: gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: They teach the doctrine that the eight deliverances are impermanent, and they do not dedicate any of their wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level, except to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //🔽gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o // gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
translated: They teach the doctrine that the ten universal bases are impermanent, and they do not dedicate any of their wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level, except to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: They teach the doctrine that the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial absorptions, and the ten universal bases are impermanent, and they do not dedicate any of their wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level, except to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: and does not dedicate them to the level of a solitary buddha.

original: gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
analyzed: gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
translated: “Furthermore, the bodhisattva great beings teach the doctrine that the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are suffering, and they do so without apprehending anything.

analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva great beings who are assisted by that spiritual friend,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na /🔽mi 'jigs / mi dngangs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na / mi 'jigs / mi dngangs /
translated: when they hear this perfection of wisdom,

original: skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will not tremble, feel frightened, or become terrified.🔽”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na /
translated: how is it

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom hear this teaching on the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas te sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung zhing /
analyzed: 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas te sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung zhing /
translated: they will be frightened, nervous, and scared, and they will be unskilled in means and fall into the hands of bad friends.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags /
translated: They will be abandoned by spiritual teachers.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te /
translated: “Subhūti, here, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom cultivate and observe the perfection of wisdom without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems sa byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs @440a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems sa byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs @440a *//
translated: They cultivate the perfection of concentration and focus on it, but do so with a mind that is not conjoined with the attention directed toward omniscience, and they falsely project with that perfection of concentration.🔽They cultivate the perfection of perseverance and focus on it, but do so with a mind that is not conjoined with the attention directed toward omniscience, and they falsely project with that perfection of perseverance.

original: te; brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te /
analyzed: te; brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te /
translated: They cultivate the perfection of patience and focus on it, but do so with a mind that is not conjoined with the attention directed toward omniscience, and they falsely project with that perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te /
translated: They cultivate and focus on the perfection of morality, but without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, and they become proud because of that perfection of morality.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni /
translated: They cultivate and focus on the perfection of giving, but without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, and they become proud because of that perfection of giving.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o //
translated: Su­bhūti, such is the lack of skill in means on the part of great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not endowed with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the thought ‘form is empty of an inner nature’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and, by way of an objective support, they apprehend inner emptiness

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they even become conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid @440b la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid @440b la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they are practicing the perfection of wisdom, they are not endowed with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to the thought ‘form is empty of an outer nature’🔽and, by way of an objective support, they apprehend outer emptiness

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they even become conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the internal and external emptiness of form, thinking, ‘Form is internal and external emptiness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of their attachment to emptiness they also apprehend internal and external emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: And they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the emptiness of emptiness of form, thinking, ‘Form is the emptiness of emptiness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: Because of their attachment to emptiness they also apprehend the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: And they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the idea ‘form is empty of a great thing.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They pay attention to the emptiness of a great thing by way of apprehending it,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the idea ‘form is empty of the ultimate.🔽They pay attention to the emptiness of the ultimate by way of apprehending it,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya @441a *//
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, they should practice it with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: ba med par gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the idea ‘form is empty of conditionedness,’🔽and they apprehend emptiness of conditionedness,

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the idea ‘form is empty of unconditionedness,’

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the idea that form is empty of the extreme.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the idea that form is empty of no beginning and no end.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of the absence of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the thought, ‘Feelings are inner emptiness.’

original: / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend inner emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged with the thought, ‘Feelings are outer emptiness.’🔽They apprehend outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the internal and external emptiness of feelings, thinking, ‘This is emptiness.’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They are also proud, thinking, ‘I am the one who is empty.’

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the thought ‘feelings are empty of a great being.’

analyzed: de / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the ‘emptiness of the transcendence of extremes’ of compounded things.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the ‘emptiness of no beginning and no end’ of compounded things.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They pay attention to the emptiness of no beginning and no end by way of apprehending it,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med🔽pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the emptiness of not being discarded, thinking ‘form is the emptiness of not being discarded,’🔽and they apprehend the emptiness of not being discarded,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the emptiness of nature, thinking ‘form is the emptiness of nature,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend the emptiness of nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that all formative predispositions are empty, thinking, “All formative predispositions are empty.”

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that all formative predispositions are empty of their own marks, thinking, “All formative predispositions are empty of their own marks.”

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong @448a *//🔽pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong @448a *// pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the ‘emptiness of nonapprehending conditioning factors,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med🔽pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de; dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the ‘emptiness of the unreality of conditioning factors,’🔽and they apprehend the emptiness of the unreality of conditioning factors,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the statement ‘compounded things are empty of an intrinsic nature,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend emptiness of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the statement ‘compounded things are empty of the nature of non-existence,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: rab @448b 'byor; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya🔽bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: rab @448b 'byor; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom are not paying attention to the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness as ‘inner emptiness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend inner emptiness

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: When they are practicing the perfection of wisdom, they are not paying attention to the knowledge of all aspects, and they pay attention to consciousness as ‘outer emptiness.’🔽They apprehend outer emptiness

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the statement ‘consciousness is inner and outer emptiness.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the statement ‘consciousness is the emptiness of emptiness.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend the emptiness of emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa chen po stong @449a *//🔽pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in ‘the emptiness of great consciousness.’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: By way of apprehending something they apprehend the emptiness of great things,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in ‘the emptiness of ultimate consciousness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: By way of apprehending something they apprehend the emptiness of the ultimate,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that consciousness is compounded emptiness.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to the fact that consciousness is uncompounded emptiness.🔽Because of their attention they apprehend uncompounded emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness as ‘infinite beyond limit.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las @449b 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las @449b 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness as ‘empty of no beginning and no end.’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to consciousness as ‘emptiness of a basic nature,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness as ‘empty of all phenomena.’

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin @450a *//

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness as ‘empty of its own mark.’

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: Because of their attention to emptiness, they also imagine that consciousness is empty of its own mark.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness, thinking, ‘Consciousness is the emptiness of non-apprehension.’

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to consciousness, thinking, ‘Consciousness is the emptiness of the nonexistence of things.’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //

translated: and they become conceited because of emptiness.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘The eye is empty of what is beyond the extremes.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘The eye is empty of no beginning and no end.

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the idea that the nose is empty of the uncompounded.🔽They apprehend emptiness of the uncompounded,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang @455b ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang @455b ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in ‘the emptiness of the limitless in the nose,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend the emptiness of the limitless,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in ‘the emptiness of no beginning and no end in the nose,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: and they apprehend the emptiness of no beginning and no end,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to ‘the emptiness of nonrejection’ as a nonexistent thing.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la; stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la; stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: They also apprehend the emptiness of nonrejection, and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they pay attention to ‘the emptiness of a basic nature’ as a nonexistent thing.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They also apprehend the emptiness of a basic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the nose, thinking, ‘All phenomena are empty,’

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang @456a *//

translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /

translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the nose, thinking, ‘The nose is empty of the nose,’🔽and they also apprehend the emptiness of its own mark,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do; ;de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sna mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘The tongue is empty of all phenomena.

original: @458a *// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: @458a *// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend emptiness of all phenomena,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lce rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom, without being mentally engaged in the knowledge of all aspects, they are mentally engaged in the thought ‘The tongue is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
translated: They apprehend emptiness of an intrinsic nature,

original: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and they are conceited about emptiness.
